mapper.sql:
WHERE BOARDNUM>0 AND
BOARDNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
WRITER LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
BOARDCONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.select:
SELECT BOARDNUM, BOARDNAME, WRITER, BOARDDATE, BOARDHIT, BOARDCONTENTS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, B.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD
ORDER BY BOARDNUM DESC)B ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{lastRow}
SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARDFILE BF ON B.BOARDNUM = BF.BOARDNUM WHERE B.BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARDNUM, WRITER, BOARDNAME, BOARDDATE, BOARDHIT, BOARDCONTENTS) VALUES (#{boardNum}, #{writer},#{boardName}, SYSDATE,0,#{boardContents})
INSERT INTO BOARDFILE (FILENUM, BOARDNUM, FILENAME, ORIGINALNAME) VALUES (FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{boardNum},#{fileName},#{originalName})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET WRITER=#{writer}, BOARDNAME=#{boardName}, BOARDCONTENTS=#{boardContents}, BOARDHIT=SYSDATE WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDHIT=#{boardHit}+1 WHERE BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
